word:
Those Who Cannot See Signs of Times Are Candidates for Plagues--God calls for men and means. Those who cannot see the signs of the times in this wicked and adulterous generation will be found with those who perish under the plagues poured from the vials of God's wrath.--Letter 109, 1899, p. 16. (To Brethren and Sisters in Africa, Aug. 8, 1899.) 


                                     -43-
